model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Model is a part of pattern MVC and it's provide program's logic work. View Controller

    1.3
    Author:
    Masev Nikita

        public void initializeRaft(int i)
        Initialize characteristic (dimension,location, information of object raft)

        Parameters:

        See Also:
        start

      • isOnRaft

        public boolean isOnRaft(Raft raft)
        It's define where locate player: player on raft or not
        Parameters:
        raft - is a one of sets raft from list
        Returns:
        true mean's player on raft, false mean's - not
        See Also:
        checkBallOnRaft

        Returns:

      • checkBallOnRaft

        public void checkBallOnRaft()
        This synchronized methods check that player locate on raft.
        If player on raft it's mean that will be send change frame event's.
        Synchronization performed on raft's methods.
        See Also:
        start

      • checkBallOutRaft

        public void checkBallOutRaft()
        This synchronized methods check that player locate out raft.
        And if a true that it'l be generate death event's.
        Synchronization performed on raft's methods.
        See Also:
        start

      • start

        public void start()
        It's a main method of game. It's occure call all
        other methods that perform initialization.
        Also there is main cycle in game,
        that figure out call methods throughout game.
        See Also:
        initialize, initializeRaft, checkBallOnRaft, checkBallOutRaft, checkBallWin
